languages.text: {n}Минуту царит молчание. Затем Арджента поворачивается к вам и небрежно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Вот и все. Мы выполнили просьбу преподобного Иеронимуса, и значит — я свободна. Я могу продолжать странствовать с вами, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Минуту царит молчание. Затем Аржента поворачивается к вам и небрежно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Вот и все. Мы выполнили просьбу преподобного Зандора, и значит — я свободна. Я могу продолжать странствовать с вами, Вольный Торговец".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Минуту царит молчание. Затем Арджента поворачивается к вам и небрежно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Вот и все. Мы выполнили просьбу преподобного Иеронимуса, и значит — я свободна. Я могу продолжать странствовать с вами, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've completed Hieronimus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've completed Hieronimus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}一分钟的寂静过后，阿洁塔将目光转向你，冷漠地耸了耸肩。{/n}“结束了，我们已经完成了希罗尼穆斯牧师的请求。这意味着我自由了，我可以继续与你一同旅行了，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}一分钟的寂静过后，阿洁塔将目光转向你，冷漠地耸了耸肩。{/n}“结束了，我们已经完成了希罗尼穆斯牧师的请求。这意味着我自由了，我可以继续与你一同旅行了，行商浪人。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Durante un minuto, se hace el silencio. Después, Argenta se gira hacia ti, encogiéndose de hombros.{/n} «Ya está. Hemos cumplido la petición del reverendo Hieronymus, por lo que puedo seguir acompañándole en sus viajes, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Durante un minuto, se hace el silencio. Después, Argenta se gira hacia ti, encogiéndose de hombros.{/n} «Ya está. Hemos cumplido la petición del reverendo Hieronymus, por lo que puedo seguir acompañándole en sus viajes, Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}沈黙がしばらく続く。そしてアルジェンタはあなたの方を向き、淡々と肩をすくめる。{/n}「これで終わりです。ヒエロニムス司祭の依頼は果たしました。つまり、我は自由というわけだ。陛下と一緒に旅を続けられます、自由開拓者」
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}沈黙がしばらく続く。そしてアルジェンタはあなたの方を向き、淡々と肩をすくめる。{/n}「これで終わりです。ヒエロニムス司祭の依頼は果たしました。つまり、我は自由というわけだ。陛下と一緒に旅を続けられます、自由開拓者」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Für eine Minute ist es still. Dann wendet Argenta sich dir zu und zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Das war's. Wir sind Reverend Hieronymus' Bitte nachgekommen, was bedeutet, dass ich jetzt frei bin. Ich kann meine Reisen mit Euch fortsetzen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Für eine Minute ist es still. Dann wendet Argenta sich dir zu und zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Das war's. Wir sind Reverend Hieronymus' Bitte nachgekommen, was bedeutet, dass ich jetzt frei bin. Ich kann meine Reisen mit Euch fortsetzen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le silence se fait. Après quelques instants, Argenta se tourne vers vous et hausse les épaules d'un air nonchalant.{/n} « Voilà. Nous avons accompli la requête du révérend Hiéronymus, ce qui me libère de mes obligations. Je peux maintenant poursuivre mes voyages avec vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le silence se fait. Après quelques instants, Argenta se tourne vers vous et hausse les épaules d'un air nonchalant.{/n} « Voilà. Nous avons accompli la requête du révérend Hiéronymus, ce qui me libère de mes obligations. Je peux maintenant poursuivre mes voyages avec vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sessizlik, tüm ağırlığıyla odayı dolduruyor. Argenta sana dönüp umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Bitti. Muhterem Hieronymus'un talebini yerine getirdik. Artık özgürüm. Senin safında seyahat etmeye devam edebilirim Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}Silence hangs for a minute. Then Argenta turns to you and shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "That's it. We've fulfilled Reverend Hieronymus's request, which means I am now free. I can continue my travels with you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sessizlik, tüm ağırlığıyla odayı dolduruyor. Argenta sana dönüp umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Bitti. Muhterem Hieronymus'un talebini yerine getirdik. Artık özgürüm. Senin safında seyahat etmeye devam edebilirim Hür Tacir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
